Articles.Content: Does someone have a darker version of the original 4K skybox which is supplied with this plugin? I really like the looks of it but I personally think it is too bright, a darker version would be a bit more realistic I think (just sticking a transparent layer of black over it in paint.net is all needed I think)
This is absolutely fantastic, it really completes the experience for me...thank you.

Yep, this thread is awesome.

Rareden, I still think you need to make a wall of Nic Cage's face using the clone tool.

Yep, this thread is awesome.

Rareden, I still think you need to make a wall of Nic Cage's face using the clone tool.

I'm honestly shocked that nobody's done this yet.
Yes, its little too bright imo, but still very cool looking and way better than standard KSP skybox.

The plugin made by someone from Germany, and a skybox made in New Zealand...

Yay for the international internet!

I like the new texture a lot. It makes the going to space thing feel a lot more like going to space.

What have i done.

Something very interesting going on there. Interesting to see planets floating in atmosphere...

Edited August 3, 2013 by Tw1

I've got a request for someone skilled in Photoshop, because I suck.

Would someone be so kind as to make a giant rainbow nebula? Because rainbows are awesome. Something like this. (I know this image is way too small for a starfield)

Why not nip over to the Hubble website and borrow a few nebulae, then drop them onto a spartan texture set using layers? An excellent way to learn Photoshopping (GIMP will do for free).

I was stunned by how good space looked with the 4096 texture. I love how the stars fade when the sun is in view. It's such a simple mod, yet stunning in the visual impact it makes.
I love this mod.

I've got a request for someone skilled in Photoshop, because I suck.

Would someone be so kind as to make a giant rainbow nebula? Because rainbows are awesome. Something like this. (I know this image is way too small for a starfield)

Oh man, this would actually be really cool- I'm a sucker for rainbows too. I might switch back and forth between skyboxes depending on what mood I'm in.

Unrelated: You showed that you could replace planet textures- how did you do that?
Downloading now, looks amazing.

Um, there is a download on the first page: Universe Replacer v1.1 (4096p).7z

I'm so smart. S-M-R-T.

Thanks.

Tingle, great addon. Just one thing. No source code as required by forum rules.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/33079-Addon-posting-rules-May-31-2013

Tingle, great addon. Just one thing. No source code as required by forum rules.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/33079-Addon-posting-rules-May-31-2013

See the first post.

Hint: any file ending in or using the letters "src" is probably the source code.
Just spectacular!

See the first post.

Hint: any file ending in or using the letters "src" is probably the source code.

Ah, missed that. was just looking at the file types.

I've got a request for someone skilled in Photoshop, because I suck.

Would someone be so kind as to make a giant rainbow nebula? Because rainbows are awesome. Something like this. (I know this image is way too small for a starfield)

Yep, this thread is awesome.

Rareden, I still think you need to make a wall of Nic Cage's face using the clone tool.

To photoshop i shall go!!!!!

Awesome mod!

Thank you guys for your work on the plugin and the skybox. The 2k version looks much crispier than the game original skybox with no performance hit. Brilliant!

I'm curious to see what people will create thanks to this new tool. I'm messing around in Spacescape at the moment, but it's going to take a while, mostly because of my poor artistic sensitivity...
Updated to v2.0, check the first thread - I rewrote pretty much everything .

it has begun....

aw yisssss, now we'll have HD everything

tingle, i looked through the folders and noticed you had texture names for Kerbin and Minmus, i replaced Kerbin's texture and specular, and it worked! but Minmus' textures don't

*edit* aww, you changed the first post, now i dont feel special anymore XD

Edited August 3, 2013 by an insignificant kerbal
Looks nice but I am having a problem where two sides (images) are not loading and I am seeing the default images in those spots. Anyone else run into this yet or know how to fix it?

tingle, i looked through the folders and noticed you had texture names for Kerbin and Minmus, i replaced Kerbin's texture and specular, and it worked! but Minmus' textures don't

*edit* aww, you changed the first post, now i dont feel special anymore XD

Sorry, had a path typo, redownload the plugin - its fixed - just painted a smiley on minmus .

Wow this is coming along nicely! We need a list of all skyblocks that have been made.

I'm still trying to get a "Tilted Galaxy" that looks good. The Tycho data didn't look good in-game, sadly. I've thought about trying to make it myself but... yeah that seems scary

I'm using the 4k resolution textures provided in the first post, everything is in the right place and all the files are there but this happens - a quarter of the texture is missing (there's another 'border' 90* to the right):

?

-----

Aside from that, provided I don't look in that particular direction: Wow. Space looks like space now
